value.content: The following is a list of KumaScript macros that has been deprecated and should no longer be used. This document also provides guidance on how to replace these macros should you encounter them in the content.

value.title: The How to replace deprecated KumaScript macros macro
value.content: The Link macro is now deprecated and should no longer be used. Any occurrences that still exist in actively-maintained content should be replaced with a plain Markdown style link.
value.titleAsText: The How to replace deprecated KumaScript macros macro

value.title: How to replace the macro
value.content:
A common usage of the macro is as follows:

The {{Link("/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Guide/Numbers_and_dates")}} page on MDN

This can be replaced with the following Markdown:

The [Numbers and dates](/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Guide/Numbers_and_dates) page on MDN

When replacing Link macros:

  • The link text must match the title of the page it's linking to.
  • Internal links are root-relative so you should omit https://developer.mozilla.org at the beginning of the URL.
